message: Hello Bob, I believe this product is incredibly valuable and will be a great asset to you. I'm happy to offer it to you at $1,300,000.
Alice, $1,300,000 is way above my budget. I'm interested in the product, but I can only go up to $850,000. Let's see if we can find a common ground.

Bob, I appreciate you taking the time to consider this offer. While $1,300,000 reflects the true value of this product, I understand your budget constraints.  How about we meet halfway at $1,100,000? This is a significant reduction and reflects my willingness to make a deal.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down, but $1,100,000 is still a bit out of my range. I'm prepared to offer $900,000.  Let's try to bridge the gap.
